text: Dale's Supermarket Sweep (also Supermarket Sweep) is a UK game show based on the American Supermarket Sweep TV show format. Originally hosted by Dale Winton, it ran for exactly between 1993 & 2001 and then revived 12 February and 31 August 2007 on ITV and then it hosted on ITV2 with Rylan Clark-Neal this time as host since 2019. Between 1993 & 2001 it was filmed at Central's Lenton Lane studios. As of 2007 it is filmed at Maidstone Studios. ==Other websites== *. *. *Dale's Supermarket Sweep (1993-2001) at BFI. *Dale's All Star Supermarket Sweep at BFI. *Dale's Supermarket Sweep (2007) at BFI. *Dale's Supermarket Sweep at UKGameshows.com.
